overview:
Entrepreneur and Internet visionary,Multi Channel Online Marketing Expert & Super Affiliate

My goals are to be successful both aspects of life….in personal AND professional life. I will not accept only one aspect.

In personal life, I want to give the best care, support, time, attention and love to my wife and our son and to my close family members and friends â€“ and to appreciate and share every single free moment I have with them - this is the most important thing in life! … In professional life, I want to have passion for what I do, wake up in the morning with a smile, build and create and try helping others in the process ,strive for continuous learning and enrich my mind, invest in myself and satisfy my will for knowledge, share with others what i have,what i earn,what I love, lead and not be led, be the best at what I do and do things the best I can.

The main goal would be to stay positive, look at life as if it was a giant wheel ride.

milestones.description: Business marketing Director - orange Israel - NASDAQ (PTNR) - Cellular Industry
